publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2057 Donald Gorrie: Flying the Flag at Holyrood—That the Parliament welcomes the decision that the Saltire, Union Flag and European Flag will be flown in front of Holyrood each day with effect from St Andrew’s Day 2004.
S2M-2057 Flying the Flag at Holyrood (lodged on 23 November 2004) Mr Jamie Stone*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Iain Smith*, Mr David Davidson*, Mike Pringle*
S2M-2057 Flying the Flag at Holyrood (lodged on 23 November 2004) Dr Jean Turner*

S2M-2057 Donald Gorrie: Flying the Flag at Holyrood—That the Parliament welcomes the decision that the Saltire, Union Flag and European Flag will be flown in front of Holyrood each day with effect from St Andrew’s Day 2004. Supported by: Mr Jamie Stone, Dr Elaine Murray, Iain Smith, Mr David Davidson, Mike Pringle, Dr Jean Turner
S2M-2057 Flying the Flag at Holyrood (lodged on 23 November 2004) Chris Ballance*
